panels.description: Percentage of CPU usage across all nodes taken at 5 minute averages
panels.title: CPU usage (5m avg)

panels.description: Percentage of memory usage across all nodes
panels.title: Memory usage

panels.description: Percentage of filesystem usage across all nodes
panels.title: Filesystem usage

panels.description: Sum of the 5 min avg of the cumulative cpu time consumed in seconds for all nodes
panels.title: Used

panels.description: Total number of logical cores across all nodes
panels.title: Total

panels.description: Sum of nodes in a "ready" state across a period of time
panels.title: Available Nodes

panels.description: Number of nodes experiencing low disk space (default value of 85%)
panels.title: Disk Pressure

panels.description: Number of nodes experiencing memory pressure
panels.title: Memory Pressure

panels.description: Number of nodes experiencing PID pressure
panels.title: PID Pressure

panels.description: Number of nodes that are unschedulable. New pods cannot be scheduled on nodes in this state.
panels.title: Unschedulable

panels.description: Number of nodes that are out of disk storage
panels.title: Out of Disk

panels.description: Number of nodes with a "NetworkUnavailable" status
panels.title: Network Unavailable

panels.description: Count of PVCs in a "bound" state
panels.title: Bound PVC

panels.description: PVC usage percentage for each PVC in the namespace, thresholds of 85% & 95% usage
panels.title: PVC Usage

panels.description: Max and current PVC usage
panels.title: PVC Usage (max & current)

panels.description: Number of pods in a "running" state in $namespace namespace
panels.title: Pods Running

panels.description: Number of pods in a "succeeded" state in $namespace namespace
panels.title: Pods Succeeded

panels.description: Number of pods in a "failed" state in $namespace namespace
panels.title: Pods Failed

panels.description: Number of pods in an "unknown" state in $namespace namespace
panels.title: Pods Unknown

panels.description: Number of pods in a "pending" state in $namespace namespace
panels.title: Pods pending
